# Sample queries for testing Korel Chat CLI

# Policy-focused queries
new feed-in tariff in Italy
hydrogen subsidies in Germany
EU renewable energy mandates

# Market queries
battery prices
solar capacity in Spain
offshore wind auction results

# Finance queries
utility earnings renewable energy
solar IPO Europe
capital expenditure solar projects

# Technology queries
microinverter efficiency
battery storage systems
lithium-ion prices

# Cross-category queries
Italy solar policy and utility investment
renewable energy targets Europe
green hydrogen production subsidies
